title: CONSUME
text:
Consume to live
Consume to strive
Consume to progress

title: TOOLS
text:
The tools of the world are at your disposal
Use them to fuel your consumption

title: WEED
text: Nature is but an obstacle on your path to progress

title: POWER
text: The measure of a man is what he does with power

title: Note from Spencer
text:
Finally I feel great.
Everyone is so nice to me here and I do what I love.
Despite what they said I don't regret joining at all.
We will rebuild and fix everything.
I am not going back

title: ENTER
text:
Your are but at the beginning of your journey.
Enter and start a new tomorrow
